name: G’ultimate Goat Golf G’mini Goat Golfing Goat Game
name_original: G’ultimate Goat Golf G’mini Goat Golfing Goat Game
description:
Have you ever thought - minigolf is too easy?
Have you ever wondered what it would be like for a goat to play minigolf?

This game will answer none of those questions. But you'll have fun with it!

Play as Billy Grufferson, a retired goat-cop with nothing left to lose as he struggles against the class system to play minigolf and win his retirement fund. (Trust me, the lore is there. Just click "Don't Play".)

Made for TOJam 13 in about 50something hours? I'm going to apologize in advance. R restarts a level and Z restarts to the main menu.
